title: Mineral deficiencies: copper and cobalt
brief_description: Science aids wool series, no. 7. This film shows the harmful effects of a deficiency of copper and cobalt in the soil in the south-eastern coastal areas of South Australia, and in certain areas in other states.
description: Science aids wool series, no. 7. This film shows the harmful effects of a deficiency of copper and cobalt in the soil in the south-eastern coastal areas of South Australia, and in certain areas in other states.
